docs.snippet: Borussia Dortmund attacking midfielder Marco Reus has been ruled out of Wednesday's Champions League round of 16 second leg against Zenit St Petersburg due to a nagging muscle injury....

docs.snippet: Billionaire James Irsay, the owner of the Indianapolis Colts, has checked into a health care facility following his arrest on suspicion of intoxicated driving and possession of a controlled substance, the National Football League team said on Tues...
docs.lead_paragraph: Billionaire James Irsay, the owner of the Indianapolis Colts, has checked into a health care facility following his arrest on suspicion of intoxicated driving and possession of a controlled substance, the National Football League team said on Tuesday.
